AD_WINDOW.NAME: Vendor Details
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Vendor Details Window allows you to display and maintain all products for a selected Vendor.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: GL Distribution
AD_WINDOW.HELP: If the account combination criteria of the Distribution is met, the posting to the account combination is replaced by the account combinations of the distribution lines. The distribution is a one-step operation based on the percentage of the lines.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Greeting
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Greeting Window defines a greeting that is then associated with a Business Partner or Business Partner Contact.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Print Form
AD_WINDOW.HELP:
Define the documents you use for this Client/Organnization. Note that the check format is defined in the Bank (Account) Window.

The highest priotity has the Print Format, you define on a Document Type (example specific Export Invoice format). The next level is the set of Print Formats, you defined for the organziation of the document printed. The default is the set of Print Formats defines for all organizations of the Client (Organization=*).

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Currency Rate
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The rates are imported after validation of currencies and conversion rate type as well as rates. The multiply rate is used. If a reciprocal rate is to be created, the divide rate is used.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Workflow Process
AD_WINDOW.HELP: View and Maintain Workflow Process Instance Information

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Workflow Activities (all)
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain all Workflow activities

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Workflow Responsible
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The ultimate responsibility for a workflow is with an actual user. The Workflow Responsible allows to define ways to find that actual User.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Registration Attributes
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define the individual values for the Asset Registration

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Registration
AD_WINDOW.HELP: User Registration of an Asset

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Bank Statement Matcher
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Algorithm to match Bank Statement Info to Business Partners, Invoices and Payments
AD_WINDOW.HELP: An algorithm to find Business Partners, Invoices, Payments in imported Bank Statements

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Payment Batch
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Electronic Fund Transfer Payment Batch.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Product Category
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Product Category allows you to define different groups of products. These groups can be used in generating Price Lists, defining margins and for easily assigning different accounting parameters for products.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Message
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Message Window defines the Message Text and Message Tips for each system generated message. It is for System Admin use only.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Sales Region
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Sales Region Window defines the different regions where you do business. You can generate reports based on Sales Regions

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Web Access
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define access to collaboration management content. You can assign the profile to a internal role or for external access to business partner group.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Cashbook
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Cashbook Window defines the bank and account against which cash transactions will be processed.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request Group
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Group of requests (e.g. version numbers, responsibility, ...)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request Resolution
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Resolution status (e.g. Fixed, Rejected, ..)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request Standard Response
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Text blocks to be copied into request response text

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request Status
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Status if the request (open, closed, investigating, ..)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Change Notice
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Stand-alone change notice - Change notices could also be directly linked to BOMs

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Knowledge Category
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Set up knowledge categories and values as a search aid. Examples are Release Version, Product Area, etc. Knowledge Category values act like keyworks.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Knowledge Base
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Type, Topics, Entries and theit Comments, Categories, Related Entries

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Price List
AD_WINDOW.HELP:
The Price List Window allows you to generate product price lists for your Business Partners. Price lists determine currency and tax treatment. Price list versions allow to maintain parallel lists for different date ranges. The most current pricelist version is used based on the document date.
All pricelists have three prices: List, Standard and Limit
First step is to create a base price list. You can manually add products and enter the prices or create them automatically. The base price list is often the purchase price list with list price ('official' retail price), the standard price (your purchase price). The limit price can be used to check your final purchase costs after discounts, rebates, etc.
Pricelists can be calculated and copied. To speed up the calculation, the parameters are stored an used when creating a new price list version.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Element
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The System Element Window is the Central Repository for Field Names Descriptions and Help/Comments

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Print Table Format
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Print Table Format lets you define how table header, etc. is printed. Please note that the Report Table FOrmat is cached to improve performance.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Payment Selection
AD_WINDOW.HELP:
The Payment Selection Window allows you to select and process the invoices you want to pay. (a) You can create a Payment Selection and select the invoices manually or generate the suggestions based on criteria. You can change the amount to be paid or delete invoices, you do not want to pay.
(b) If you are happy with the Payment Selection, you create the payments.
(c) You print or export your payments in the Window Payment Print/Export

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Window, Tab & Field
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Window, Tab & Field Window defines the presentation of tables and columns within each window.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Validation Rules
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain dynamic Validation Rules for columns and fields
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Validation Rules Window defines all dynamic rules used when entering and maintaining columns and fields. This window is for System Admin use only.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Organization
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Organization Window allows you to define and maintain Organizational entities. An Organization is often a legal entity or sub-unit for which documents and transactions are processed

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request Processor
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Request Processor Window allows you to define different processes that you want to occur and the frequency and timing of these processes A Request Processor can be just for a specific Request Type or for all.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Cost Element
AD_WINDOW.HELP: You can define your own product cost elements.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Product Costs
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Product Cost Elements

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Web Store
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define the web store setup.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Counter
AD_WINDOW.HELP: A web counter maintains how often a page or item was displayed. Add a call to http://www.adempiere.com/wstore/counter to the page (e.g. display a 1x1 image)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Tax Declaration
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define the declaration to the tax authorities
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The tax declaration allows you to create supporting information and reconcile the documents with the accounting

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Print Paper
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Printer Paper Size, Orientation and Margins

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Charge
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Charges Window defines the different charges that may be incurred. These can include Bank Charges, Vendor Charges and Handling Charges.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Accounting Fact Details
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Query the detail accounting transactions

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Invoice (Customer)
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Customer Invoice Window allows you to display and enter invoices for a customer. Invoices can also be generated from Sales Orders or Delivery documents.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Discount Schema
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Trade discount schema calculates the trade discount percentage

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Expense Report
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The time and expense report allows you to capture time spent on a project, billable time and to claim expenses.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: System Color
AD_WINDOW.HELP: System colors are used for background and indicators

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Desktop
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Desktop is a collection of Workbenches

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Matched Purchase Orders
AD_WINDOW.HELP: View detals of matched purchase order lines to invoice lines and material receipt lines

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Window Customization
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The customization values defined here overwrite/replace the default system definition if defined.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Workbench
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Workbenches are a collection of Windows

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request (all)
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: View and work on all requests
AD_WINDOW.HELP: This Request window is used to view all available requests

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Payment
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Process Payments Window allows you to enter payments and reaipts for invoices. If the payment is for a single invoice then it can be processed here. If it is for multiple invoices or is a partial payment then it should be processed in the Payment Allocation Window.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Account Combination
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Account Combination Window defines and displays valid account combinations.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Auction Buyer
AD_WINDOW.HELP: A buyer is a User in the system participating in Auctions

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Location
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Location Window defines the address data within the system. This window is for System Admin only. Users would access location entries using the location button or tab on the appropriate window (i.e Order Entry or Business Partner)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Workflow
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Workflow Window defines Workflows in the system, the access level for the Workflow and the Nodes or Steps within the Workflow.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Business Partner
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Business Partner window allows you do define any party with whom you transact. This includes customers, vendors and employees. Prior to entering or importing products, you must define your vendors. Prior to generating Orders you must define your customers. This window holds all information about your business partner and the values entered will be used to generate all document transactions

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Revenue Recognition
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Revenue Recognition Window defines the intervals at which revenue will be recognized. Alternatively, the revenue recognition may be linked to service levels provided.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Invoice (Vendor)
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Vendor Invoice Window allows you to display and enter Invoices from a Vendor. Vendor Invoices can also be generated from Purchase Orders or Delivery Receipts.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Shipper
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Shipper Window defines the different shipping provides used by an Organization. When a delivery method of Shipper is used on an Order a predefined Shipper must be selected.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Sales Order
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Order Window allows you to enter and modify Sales Orders.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Activity (ABC)
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Activities for Activity Based Costing
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Activity Based Costing Window defines the different activities for which you want to capture costs.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Document Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Document Type Window defines any document to be used in the system. Each document type provides the basis for processing of each document and controls the printed name and document sequence used.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Forecast
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Material Forecast

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Task
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Maintain Tasks window defines the different tasks used in workflows and the access level for those tasks.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Currency
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Currency Window defines any currency which will be used in documents or reporting. You would define used currencies on System level and add currencies on Client level only for statistical currencies (e.g. for instable currencies)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Loader Format
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Import Loader Format Window is used for defining the file layout for product information which will be imported.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Production
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Production based on Bill of Materials
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Production Window defines those plan and inventory movements that occur when a product is created from a bill of materials

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Interest Area
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Interest Areas reflect interest in a topic by a contact. Interest areas can be used for marketing campaigns.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Info Window
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Info window is used to search and select records as well as display information relevant to the selection.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Text Index
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Text search index keyword and excerpt across documents

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Text Index Stop
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain keywords not to be indexed

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Attribute Set
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define Product Attribute Sets to add additional attributes and values to the product. You need to define a Attribute Set if you want to enable Serial and Lot Number tracking.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Confirmations
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Import Confirmation data of existing Receipt/Shipment Confirmations

AD_WINDOW.NAME: SLA Criteria
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define a criteria to measure service level agreements (e.g. Quality, Delivery meets Promised date, ..)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: SLA by Partner
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Service Level Agreements for Business Partners

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Price List Schema
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Price List schema defines calculation rules for price lists

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Reporting Hierarchy
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Reporting Hierarchy allows you to select different Hierarchies/Trees for the report. Accounting Segments like Organization, Account, Product may have several hierarchies to accomodate different views on the business

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Color Schema
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Visual representation of performance by color. The Schema has often three levels (e.g. red-yellow-green). Adempiere support two levels (e.g. red-green) or four levels (e.g. gray-bronce-silver-gold). Note that Measures without a goal are represented white. The percentages could be beween 0 and unlimited (i.e. above 100%).

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Account Element
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Account Element Window is used to define and maintain the Accounting Element and User Defined Elements. One of the account segments is your natural account segment (Chart of Account). You may add a new account element for parallel reporting or for user defined accounting segments.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Document Sequence
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Sequence Window defines how document numbers will be sequenced. Change the way document numbers are generated. You may add a prefix or a suffix or change the current number.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Bank Statement
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Process Bank Statements window allows you to reconcile your Bank Statements. You can either enter the line items from the statement in the Statement Line tab or select the 'Create From' button to automatically generate the statement from all unreconciled payments to this bank account. Once you have completed reconciling, select the 'Process Statement' button to mark the payments as reconciled and update the appropriate GL accounts.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Attachment
AD_WINDOW.HELP: For System Maintenance Only. The Maintain Attachments window is used for diagnostic purposes to display the attributes of an attachment.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Preference
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain System Client Org and User Preferences
AD_WINDOW.HELP: System Admin use only.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Perpetual Inventory
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Perpetual Inventory defines the rules to be applied when generating Physical Inventory counts.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: System
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Common System Definition - Only one Record - Do not add additional records.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Marketing Campaign
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Marketing Campaign Window defines the start and end date for a campaign. It also gives a running balance of the invoice amounts which referred to this campaign.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Marketing Channel
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Marketing Channel Window defines the different channels used in Marketing Campaigns

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Expenses (to be invoiced)
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: View expenses and charges not invoiced to customers
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Before invoicing to customers, check the expense lines to be invoiced

AD_WINDOW.NAME: GL Fund (Alpha)
AD_WINDOW.HELP: General Ledger Funds Control allows you to restrict the use of funds. This is independent from budget control.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Custom Attribute
AD_WINDOW.HELP: This is a System only Window. Customer Attributes allow the entry of additional information to an entity.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Ratio
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Calculation instruction for a ratio

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Goal
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Performance Goal Window allows you to define performance goals or all, a role or a user

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Menu
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Maintain Menu Window defines the Menu which will display. It is for System Admin use only. The menu items that each user will see depends upon the security defined.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Language
AD_WINDOW.HELP:
The Language Window allows you to define multiple parallel language for users. This allows users to access the same data but have the windows, tabs and fields appear in different languages. If a language is a System Language, you can change the User Interface to this language (after translation). Otherwise the language is only used for printing documents.
For the language code, we suggest using the Java convention of country and language (e.g. fr_CN - Canadian French).
Verify the translation creates missing translation records. Start this process after creating a new language.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Calendar Year and Period
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Calendar Year and Periods defines the calendars that will be used for period control and reporting. You can also define non-standard calendars (e.g. business year from July to June).

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Benchmark
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Data Series to compare internal performance with (e.g. stock price, ...)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Issue Status
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Status of an Issue

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Issue Project
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Issue Management Project Links - automatically generated.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Role
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Role Window allows you to define the different roles that users of this system will have. Roles control access to windows, tasks, reports, etc. For a client an Administrator and User role are predefined. You may add additional roles to control access for specific functionality or data. You can add users to the role. Note that access information is cached and requires re-login or reset of cache.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Country Region and City
AD_WINDOW.HELP:
The Countries, Regions and Cities Window defines the different entities that can be used in any address field. It defines the format of the address as well as associating Regions with Countries and Cities with Regions or Countries.

You would define Countries usually only on System level.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Error Message
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Error Message Window displays all error messages generated. This is for System Admin use only. The records must be manually deleted.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Mail Template
AD_WINDOW.HELP:
Mail templates can contain variables of the user, business partner or a general object. The priority of parsing is User/Contact, Business Partner and then the underlying business object (like Request, Dunning, Workflow object).
So, @Name@ would resolve into the User name (if user is defined defined), then Business Partner name (if business partner is defined) and then the Name of the business object if it has a Name.
For Multi-Lingual systems, the template is translated based on the Business Partner's language selection.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: System Issue Report
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Automatically created or manually entered System Issue Reports
AD_WINDOW.HELP: System Issues are created to speed up the resolution of any system related issues (potential bugs). If enabled, they are automatically reported to Adempiere. No data or confidential information is transferred.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Position
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain internal (employee) or external positions

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Remuneration
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Wages and Salaries

AD_WINDOW.NAME: BOM Change Notice
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Bill of Materials (Engineering) Change Notice (Version)
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Change notices can be linked to BOMs or be stand alone.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Attribute Set Instance
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: View Attribute Set Instance detail and use

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Accounting Schema
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Accounting Schema - For changes to become effective you must re-login
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Accounting Schema Window defines an accounting method and the elements that will comprise an account structure. Create and activate elements for detailed accounting for Business Partners, Products, Locations, etc. Review and change the GL and Default accounts. The actual accounts used in transactions depend on the executing organization; Most of the information is derived from the context.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Organization Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Organization Type allows you to categorize your organizations for reporting purposes

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Scheduler
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Schedule processes to be executed asynchronously

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Workflow Processor
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Workflow Processor Server Parameters

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Bid Topic
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Manage Topics and veiw Bids and Offers

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Auction Topic Type
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Auction Topic Type and Categories
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Auction Topic Type determines what kind of auction is used for a particular area

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Auction Seller
AD_WINDOW.HELP: A seller is a User in the system participating in Auctions

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Accounting Processor
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Accounting Processor/Server Parameters and Logs

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Alert Processor
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Alert Processor/Server Parameter and Logs
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Alert Processor/Server Parameter

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Bank
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Bank Window is used to define the banks and accounts associated with an organization or business partner

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Dunning
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Dunning Window defines the parameters that will be used when generating Dunning Letters. Each customer can be associated with a Dunning Code.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Click
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Web Clicks allow you to track number of clicks. Example: <a href="http://www.adempiere.com/wstore/click?http://www.adempiere.de" target="_blank"> where "http://www.adempiere.com/wstore/click" is your side and "http://www.adempiere.de" is the target page. If you created a web click for http://www.adempiere.de, you will be able to see details and total of web clicks.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Accounting Fact Balances
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Query daily account balances

AD_WINDOW.NAME: RfQ
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Request for Quotation to be sent out to vendors of a RfQ Topic. After Vendor selection, optionally create Sales Order or Quote for Customer as well as Purchase Order for Vendor(s)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Subscription
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Subscription of a Business Partner of a Product to renew

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Subscription Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Subscription type and renewal frequency

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Distribution List
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Distribution list contain business partners and a distribution quantity or ratio for creating Orders

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Package
AD_WINDOW.HELP: A Shipment can have one or more Packages. A Package may be tracked.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: RMA
AD_WINDOW.HELP: A Return Material Authorization may be required to accept returns and to create Credit Memos

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Dunning Run
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Manage Dunning Runs

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Request Types are used for processing and categorizing requests. Options are Account Inquiry, Warranty Issue, etc.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Partner Relation
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Business Partner Relation allow to maintain Third Party Relationship rules: who receives invoices for shipments or pays for invoices.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: RfQ Topic
AD_WINDOW.HELP: A Request for Quotation Topic allows you to maintain a subscriber list of potential Vendors to respond to RfQs

AD_WINDOW.NAME: System Registration
AD_WINDOW.HELP: System Registration - Only one Record - Do not add additional records.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Internal Use Inventory
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Internal Use of Inventory Window allows enter the quantity of used products.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request Category
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Category or Topic of the Request

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Asset Group
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The group of assets determines default accounts. If a asset group is selected in the product category, assets are created when delivering the asset.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Training
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The training may have multiple actual classes

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Project Reporting
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Project Cycle Window defines the steps associated with a specific Project. You may want to define several Project cycles to differentiate the different types of projects. Project cycles may use all or a subset of the used Project Status (e.g. Your opportunity project cycle may include the steps from prospect to contract - the service cycle may include steps from installation to customer acceptance.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Measure Calculation
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define how you calculate your performance measures
AD_WINDOW.HELP:
The Performance Measure Calculation defines how performance measures will be calculated. The sql needs to return a single value. Please check examples.
The date trestriction is defined in the Goal. Any restrictions for Organizations, Business Partners, Products, etc. are as Performance Goal Restrictions.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Unit of Measure
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Unit of Measure Window is used to define non monetary units of measure. It also defines if conversion between units of measure are allowed and how they are to be performed. The system provides some automatic conversions between units of measures (e.g. minute, hour, day, working day, etc.) if they are not explicitly defined here. Conversions need to be direct (i.e. if you have only a conversion between A-B and B-C, the system cannot convert A-C, you need to define it explicitly).

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Service Level
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Service Levels are generated when an invoice with products based on revenue recognition rules are generated. You need to update the actual service level by adding an additional line.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Field Group
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Field Group Window allows you to define subsections in a tab. For System Admin use only.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Notice
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The system creates messages while performing processes. In this window you can view them.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Move Confirmation
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The document is automatically created when the document type of the movement indicates In Transit.. If there is a difference quantity, a Physical Inventory is created for the source (from) warehouse. If there is a scrapped quantity, a Physical Inventory is created for the target (to) warehouse.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: System Translation Check
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Verify your language translations for selected entities. You should use Translation Export / Import for effective translation. This window allows you to check the translation of the main translation entities.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Expenses (not reimbursed)
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: View expenses and charges not reimbursed
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Before reimbursing expenses, check the open expense items

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Commission Run
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Commission Run Window displays the results of processing commissions. When the Generate Commission process is selected from the Commissions Window, the results are displayed here. If the result is satisfactory, generate an AP invoice to pay the commission.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Serial No Control
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Definition to create Serial numbers for Products

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Attribute
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Product Attribute like Color, Size, etc.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Withholding (1099)
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Withholding Window defines the rule used for calculating withholding amounts.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Business Partner Group
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Business Partner Group window allows you to define the accounting parameters at a group level. If you define the accounting parameters for a group any Business Partner entered using this group will have these accounting parameters automatically populated. You can then make any modifications necessary at the Business Partner level.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Report View
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Report View Window defines the views used when generating reports. This window is for System Admin use only.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Purchase Order
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Purchase Order Window defines a purchase order for an organization. When a Purchase Order has been entered you can generate a Shipment Document or Invoice from this Purchase Order

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Matched Invoices
AD_WINDOW.HELP: View detals of matched invoice lines to material receipt lines

AD_WINDOW.NAME: User
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The User Window allows you to maintain User of the system. Users can log into the system and have access to functionality via one or more roles. A user can also be a business aprtner contact.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Request
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Request Window is used to define and track any request assigned to you.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: View Allocation
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Reverse Allocation Window allows you to view and reverse a payment allocation

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Product
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Import Products Window is an interim table which is used when importing external data into the system. Selecting the 'Process' button will either add or modify the appropriate records.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Account
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Import Natural Account Window is an interim table which is used when importing external data into the system. Selecting the 'Process' button will either add or modify the appropriate records.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Counter Document
AD_WINDOW.HELP: When using explicit documents for inter-org transaction (after linking a Business Partner to an Organization), you can determine what document type the counter document is based on the document type of the original transaction. Example: a "Standard Order" creates a "Standard PO". If you define a relationship here, you overwrite the default counter document type in the Document Type definition. This allows you to define a specific mapping. If not defined, the first matching document type is used (e.g. AR Invoice - first AP Invoice document type)

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Inventory Move
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Inventory Move Window allows you to move inventory from one location or warehouse to another. After the appropriate lines are entered selecting the 'Process Movements' button will adjust the inventory.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Demand
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Material Demand can be based on Forecast, Requisitions, Open Orders

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Invoice Schedule
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Invoice Schedule Window defines the frequency and cut off dates for generating summary invoices. If a customer requires a single invoice for multiple shipments you would define the appropriate invoice schedule and associate it with the Customer.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Product
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Product Window defines all products used by an organization. These products include those sold to customers, used in the manufacture of products sold to customers and products purchased by an organization.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Physical Inventory
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Physical Inventory Window allows you to generate inventory count lists. These counts can then be processed which will update the actual inventory with the new counts. Normally you would create inventory count lines automaticelly. If you create them manually, make sure that the book value is correct.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Print Font
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Font used for printing

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Print Format
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The print format determines how data is rendered for print.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Tree
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Tree Window defines the descriptors and images that will be used when a Tree is displayed.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Report & Process
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Report & Process Window is used to define the parameters and access rules for every Report and Process within the system. This window is for System Admin use only.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Ship/Receipt Confirm
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Confirmation of Shipment or Receipt - Created from the Shipment/Receipt

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Process Audit
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Process Instance Information

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Payment Term
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Payment Terms Window defines the different payment terms that you offer your customers and that are offered to you by your vendors. Each invoice must contain a Payment Term. On the standard invoice, the Name and the Document Note of the Payment Term is printed.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Requisition
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Enter and maintain Material Requisitions. Material Requisition can be created automatically via Replenishment. You create generate optionally consolidated Purchase Orders.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: POS Terminal
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain your Point of Sales Terminal
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The POS Terminal defines the defaults and functions available for the POS Form

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Invoice Batch
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Enter expense invoices in batch. After creating the lines, the actual invoices are created when processing the batch

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Budget Control
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Budget Control allows you to restrict the use of expenditures, commitments (Purchase Orders) and reservations (Requisitions). If defined, you mey not be able to approve Requisitions, Purchse Orders, or AP Invoices.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Lot Control
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Definition to create Lot numbers for Products

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Client
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Client is the highest level of an independent business entity. Each Client will have one or more Organizations reporting to it. Each Client defines the accounting parameters (Accounting Schema, Tree definition, Non Monetary UOM's). To create new Clients, run the Initial Client Setup with the System Administrator Role. Do not create a new client in this window, but use "Initial Client Setup" to set up the required security and access rules. If you create a new client here, you will not be able to view it and also the required client infrastructure would not have been set up.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Currency Rate
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Conversion Rates window is used to define the conversion rates that will be used when converting document amounts from one currency to another. Note that only the multiply rate is used; The divide rate is for visualization only.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Project (Lines/Issues)
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Maintain Sales Order and Work Order Details
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Project Window is used to maintain details of Projects Lines and Issues accross Phases/Tasks

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Business Partner
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Import Business Partner Window is an interim table which is used when importing external data into the system. Selecting the 'Process' button will either add or modify the appropriate records.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Report Line Set
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Import Report Line Set Window is an interim table which is used when importing external data into the system. Selecting the 'Process' button will either add or modify the appropriate records.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Order
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Please set Y/N selections in the import loader format explicitly (e.g. as constants) and no not leave them NULL. A NULL value stands for "don't know". In general, selection boxes are not selected if the value is not "Y" (i.e. could be null or any other value). All tests are made on "Y" or "not Y" - i.e. NULL values are not "not Y", but NULL (don't know) - see SQL Language introductions.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Freight Category
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Freight Categories are used to calculate the Freight for the Shipper selected

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Accounting Dimensions
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Trees of non account segment trees. Account segment trees (as well as user defined dimensions) are mainatained in the Account Element window. Please note that you will not be able to create new entities in this window if you have not default set for all manfatory values!

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Replication
AD_WINDOW.HELP:
Data Replication Target Details. Set up your system completely on the central system, before setting up the replication. Define the Replication target here and export the database and import it on the remote system.

Before(!) entering transactions, Start the Replication Run to set up the remote system.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Replication Strategy
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Data Replication Strategy determines which tables and how they are replicated. Note that the migration does not syncronize Application Dictionary items.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Access Audit
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Audit of Access to data or resources
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Logging needs to be explicitly enabled / written.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: RMA Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain the types of RMA

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Knowledge Source
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Source of a Knowlegde Entry is a pointer to the originating system. The Knowledge Entry has an additional entry (Description URL) for more detailed info.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Knowledge Synonym
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Search Synonyms for Knowledge Keywords; Example: Product = Item

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Currency Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Currency Conversion Rate Type lets you define different type of rates, e.g. Spot, Corporate and/or Sell/Buy rates.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Project
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Project Window is used to define the projects which will can be tracked by phases and tasks.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: GL Category
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The GL Category Window allows you to define categories to be used in journals. These categories provide a method of optionally grouping and reporting on journals.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import GL Journal
AD_WINDOW.HELP: You way want to check the balance of the import with "Validate Only" before importing. Unbalanced Journals are imported; the handling is based on your settings for the posting process. The optional balance check checks the entire import, not individual batches and journals.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Sales Rep Info
AD_WINDOW.HELP: This window allows you to view Company agent related information

AD_WINDOW.NAME: UnPosted Documents
AD_WINDOW.HELP: View unposted documents

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Tax Rate
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Tax Rate Window defines the different taxes used for each tax category. For example, Sales Tax must be defined for each State in which it applies.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Asset
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Asset used internally or by customers
AD_WINDOW.HELP: An asset is either created by purchasing or by delivering a product. An asset can be used internally or be a customer asset.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Tax Category
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Tax Category Window is used to enter and maintain Tax Categories. Each product is associated with a tax category which facilitates reacting changing tax rates.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Warehouse & Locators
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Warehouse and Locators Window defines each Warehouse, any Locators for that Warehouse and the Accounting parameters to be used for inventory in that Warehouse.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Print Color
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Colors used for printing

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Performance Measure
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Performance Measure Window allows you to define the rules and restrictions for performance measurement. You can, for example, restrict performance measurement to sales for a certain product category for a defined time frame.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Financial Report
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Financial Reports are the combination of a Report Column Set and Line Set.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Report Column Set
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Report Column Set defines what data is printed in the columns of a report.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Report Line Set
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Line Set determines, which lines are printed in a Financial Report

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Cash Journal
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Cash Journal Window is used to record disbursements from and receipts to Petty Cash

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Distribution Run
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Distribution Run create Orders to distribute products to a selected list of partners
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Distribution Run defines how Orders are created based on Distribution Lists

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Resource
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain your Resources. The product for the resource is automatically created and synchronized. Update Name, Unit of Measure, etc. in the Resource and don't change it in the product.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Resource Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Resource types and their principal availability.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Table and Column
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Table and Column Window defines all tables with their columns

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Reference
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Reference Window defines field/display types and validations. This window is for System Admin use only.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Inventory
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Validate and Import Inventory Transactions

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Role Data Access
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Data Access Roles of Roles/Responsibilties. Note that access information is cached and requires re-login or reset of cache.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Advertisement
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Advertisements on the Web

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Change Audit
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Log of data changes

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Cost Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: You can define multiple cost types. A cost type selected in an Accounting Schema is used for accounting.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Time Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain different types of time for reporting

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Invoice Payment Schedule
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Payment Schedule of unpaid invoices

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Alert
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Adempiere Alerts allow you define system conditions you want to be alerted of

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Import Invoice
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Import invoiced loaded

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Web Project
AD_WINDOW.HELP: At the level of the web project you define the project itself, it's domains and media servers. Each project needs to have at least one domain and one media server.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Web Ad Management
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Content Management Ad Management defines the needed categories and items
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Ad Management is used to create and manage advertisements in your conten management

AD_WINDOW.NAME: News Channel
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Define News Channels, write and publish articles
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define News Channels, write and publish articles

AD_WINDOW.NAME: View Chat
AD_WINDOW.HELP: View chat / discussion threads

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Media Item
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Content Management Media

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Chat Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Chat Types

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Entity Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The entity type determines the ownership of Application Dictionary entries. The types "Dictionary" and "Adempiere" should not be used and are maintainted by Adempiere (i.e. all changes are reversed during migration to the current definition).

AD_WINDOW.NAME: LDAP Server
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: LDAP Server to authenticate and authorize external systems based on Adempiere
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The LDAP Server allows third party software (e.g. Apache) to use the users defined in the system to authentificate and authorize them. There is only one server per Adempiere system. The "o" is the Client key and the optional "ou" is the Interest Area key.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Package Maintenance
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Review package installation. Also perform package rollback if required

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Common Package Details
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create and maintain common package element details

AD_WINDOW.NAME: PackIn - Import a package
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Imports a package previously created by PackOut

AD_WINDOW.NAME: GL Journal
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Enter and change Manual Journal Entries
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The GL Journal Window allows you to enter and modify manual journal entries

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Material Receipt
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Vendor Shipment Window defines the receipt of product or material from a Vendor. The Shipment may be manually entered or may be generated from a Purchase Order or Vendor Invoice.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: EDI Definition
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The EDI Definition Window defines the parameters to be used when processing EDI Transactions

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Form
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Forms Window defines any window which is not automatically generated. For System Admin use only.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Shipment (Customer)
AD_WINDOW.HELP: The Shipment Window defines shipments made or to be made to a customer. They are generated from an Customer Order. The Shipment Document will generate the Customer Invoice.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Commission
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Define how and when you want the commissions to be calculated and to whom to pay it. The Commissions Window allows you define how commissions and royalties will be paid. You can pay multiple commissions for the same order or invoice (e.g. to the person entering the transaction, to the person responsible for sale of the product (category) and or business partner (group).

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Lot
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain the individual Lot of a Product

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Attribute Search
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Attributes are specific to a Product Attribute Set (e.g. Size for T-Shirts: S,M,L). If you have multiple attributes and want to search under a common sttribute, you define a search sttribute. Example: have one Size search attribute combining the values of all different sizes (Size for Dress Shirt XL,L,M,S,XS). The Attribute Search allows you to have all values available for selection. This eases the maintenance of the individual product attribute.

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Expense Invoice (Alpha)
AD_WINDOW.DESCRIPTION: Payables expense invoices - This is Alpha Functionality
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Enter expense invoices from your vendors

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Print Label
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Format to print Labels

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Session Audit
AD_WINDOW.HELP: History of Online or Web Sessions

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Project Type
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Maintain Project Types and their Phases with standard performance information

AD_WINDOW.NAME: Recurring
AD_WINDOW.HELP: Create new documents based on existing one
